attributes.action: The UK Government to work with other countries to place Afghan refugees
attributes.background: In the long run it is not good for Afghan refugees to come to the UK. It is better to work with non governmental organisations and other countries to place them in a country with similar weather, culture and laws. President Trump made an agreement with Saudi Arabia to take Syrian fleeing from ISIS.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595023
